PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_Asset
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An asset is a uniquely identifiable element which has a financial value and against which maintenance actions are recorded.

PropertyDef.Name: AssetAccountingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of risk from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: AssetTaxType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of taxation group from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: AssetInsuranceType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of insurance rating from which the type required may be set.
